word:
God Above All. 

                                       Sanitarium, Cal., Jan. 2, 1904. 

Dr. J. H. Kellogg, 
     Sanitarium, 
     Battle Creek, Mich. 

My dear Brother:-- 
     I have received your letter, and also a copy of a circular letter recently sent out by you. Thank you. I have ever had an intense desire to see you standing firm in God, working under the direction of the great head Physician.
